import { useEffect } from "react"; import { ThumbUpIcon, ThumbDownIcon, EyeIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { fetchPostsAction } from "../../redux/slices/posts/postSlices"; import { DateFormatter } from "../../utils/DateFormatter"; export default function PostsList() { //dispatch const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchPostsAction()); }, [dispatch]); //select post from store const post = useSelector(state => state?.post); const { postLists, loading, appErr, serverErr } = post; console.log(postLists); return ( <>
Latest Posts from our awesome authors

{/* View All */}

Categories

    Categories Error goes here
    No category

  • {/* {category?.title} */} category List

{/* Post goes here */} {loading ? (

) : appErr || serverErr ? (

{appErr}-{serverErr}

) : postLists?.lenght <= 0 ? (

No Post Found

) : ( postLists?.map((post) => (
< Link to=""> {/* Post image */} {/* Likes, views dislikes */}
{/* Likes */}
{/* Togle like */}
{post?.likes?.length ? post?.likes?.length : 0}
{/* Dislike */}
{post?.disLikes?.lenght ? post?.disLikes?.lenght : 0}

{/* {capitalizeWord(post?.title)} */} {post?.title}

{post?.description}

{/* Read more */} Read More.. {/* User Avatar */}

{post?.user?.firstName} {post?.user?.lastName}

·
{/*

Quisque id sagittis turpis. Nulla sollicitudin rutrum eros eu dictum...

*/}
)) )}
); }
